title: [Self-Directed] Utilization of Integrated Management Systems for University Science Education Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Science Knowledge and General Understanding of University Education Systems
context.additional_context: Integrated competency development and educational activity management using smartphone-based portal systems

learning_goals: Learners can explain interconnections between science subjects via a portal system with over 80% accuracy.
Using a portal system, learners can reduce administrative task completion time by 30%.
By exploring a knowledge repository, learners can identify and utilize at least five science education resources.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
